page.title: 13THE ARTS IN SALTBURN
page.content: There are 3 venues for theatrical entertainment including 1{fully {equipped 150 seat theatre}in the Community Centre. Performances are almost wholly amateur, given by the {Saltburn '53 Society}to audiences averaging 70. In addition there is a community theatre group,{Stepladder, based in Saltburn. They usually perform elsewhere. Visits from professional companies are rare. {Dance}is taught and performed in the Community Centre. Occasionally a professional company performs. {Music}is popular. There are many full time music teachers and an{Annual {Competitive 14 Day Music Festival.} Amateur and professional performances occur regularly. Professional and amateur{Artists}work in Saltburn exhibiting mainly at the { {Annual Artists' Forum}in various media
